features: What you will get: you will receive a package that includes 10 different styles, 24 pieces of envelopes, and 48 pieces of letter writing paper, adequate amount and styles to meet your daily needs

Size information: the size of vintage floral writing paper is 6.9 x 5.1 inch, the vintage envelope is 5.6 x 3.6 inch, and the size of floral stationery paper is 8.3 x 5.7 inch, the floral stationery envelope is 6 x 3.6 inch, 2 different sizes of writing paper fits nicely in an envelope, the appropriate size is convenient for daily use

Quality material and nice writing: adopting durable paper material, strong with no ink bleeding, convenient for you to write more smoothly, and ideal for use with ballpoint, gel pens, fountain pens, pencils, etc., they are durable to serve you for a long time, giving you a nice use feeling

Versatile stationery set: the stationery paper and envelopes are suitable for writing letters, and designing business invitations, party invitations, blessing messages, greeting notes, thank you notes, etc.; These pretty stationery papers are also suitable for daily writing and sending friends as gifts to increase friendship with each other

Attentive gift: this flower stationery envelope is a nice gift choice for those who love to write handwritten letters or writing paper collectors, writing a warm word to a friend or family is a way to show your care; Warm greetings, sincere blessings, surprises, and party banquets can all be achieved with this stationery set
body.description: Features: 2 Sizes and 10 different styles provide multiple choices for you, and will bring different feelings to your family and friends, they will love this exquisite gift. Double-sided printing stationery paper, the vintage floral envelope elegant design will attract people's attention well. Specifications: Material: paper Color: as the picture shown Size: Vintage floral writing paper: 6.9 x 5.1 inch Vintage envelope: 5.6 x 3.6 inch Floral stationery paper: 8.3 x 5.7 inch Floral stationery envelope: 6 x 3.6 inch Package includes: 48 x Stationery papers 24 x Envelopes Notes: Manual measurement, please allow slight errors on size. The color may exist slight difference due to different screen displays.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars CUTE STATIONERY SET ... BUT
reviews.reviewText: I just opened the package. Must say it's a lot of writing paper and envelopes for the $$. The letter sheets are small - seems like 5 x 7.. some sheets are 5 1/2 x 8. Some envelopes are pre-creased, some not. None have adhesive glue, so better find some scotch tape or stickers. The writing stock is nice and heavy, but the envelopes are somewhat flimsy. I hope they don't tear when I stuff a two page letter into them. The larger sheets also come with bigger envelopes. Each pattern is very cute - I'm especially partial to the roses and floral prints in general. Was hoping those would be good to write to my Granddaughter, while the other prints, appearing more masculine, to my Grandson. However, one set says "I'm in love with you" - kind of strange. Another has a printed message "do what you love" which is more neutral. Only those two sets, luckily, have messages. One set has a ladybug wearing a witches' hat - weird but amusing. Don't know what the artist was thinking ... Each design is separately prepackaged in its own cellophane bag - the entire set is nicely packaged. The pastel envelopes with corresponding floral writing paper, are lined with the cute matching floral print. In conclusion, as my Mom used to say, you get what you pay for. I'd say this set is more quantity than quality, but, in general, is very cute and appropriate for kids to use, or adults to correspond with them. Overall, worth the $$.
